title: 怎么设置物品拿在手中获得buff
author: 凉化吃沉木
txt_content: 物品拿在手中获得饥饿的buff1.7.10java版

replies.author: 暗影月赎
replies.txt_content:
凉化吃沉木 发表于 2020-5-13 14:46
数字ID4755，玩家手持的时候获得饥饿效果
前置内容：
/scoreboard objectives add Item dummy
/scoreboard players add @a 0

高频连接：
/scoreboard players set @a Item 1 {SelectedItem:{id:"物品英文ID",Count:物品的数量}}
/effect @a[score_Item_min=1] 药水效果ID 时间 等级
/scoreboard players set @a[score_Item_min=1] Item 0

replies.author: 暗影月赎
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcmod.cn/tools/cbcreator/
